name: omegaice-plugins
description: Personal marketplace for custom Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: endpoint-exploration
plugins.description: Document REST API endpoints through systematic empirical testing. Analyzes URL structure, generates minimal test cases, executes requests, and produces concise API documentation.

plugins.name: sandbox-cleanup
plugins.description: Monitors bwrap sandbox processes and removes 0-byte placeholder files created by --ro-bind /dev/null mounts.
